demo

Class FileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • httpserver.HTTPHandler
      • demo.FileHandler

  • public class FileHandler
extends HTTPHandler
    A HTTPHandler that handles file requests.

    This class overrides HTTPHandler.handle() because it needs to do special things in order to server files.

    It also overrides HTTPHandler.writeData() because it needs two different types of responses since images are not written the same way as text data.

        Where the actual data is sent back to the client. If a child handler has non-generic text data to be sent, this is what should be modified.
